ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T21:16:55 [Issue ID 4000-153916] urn:comicvine:4000-153916 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 23:32:42. [Issue ID 352971]
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Fundalini Pages: Various short satires of pop culture.
Lame Attempts By TV to Explain the 2008 Presidential Vote: Phony statistics to explain how people voted in the presidential election.
A MAD Look at Snow: Things that can go wrong when it snows a lot.
MAD's 12 Surefire Tips for Stand-Up Comics: Bad ideas for stand-up comics, so they can avoid them.
MAD's Sucky Twilight Outtakes: Stills from the movie "Twilight" with fake dialog.
MAD Exposes Who's Thinking What at the Obama Inauguration: Thoughts that might be happening at the inauguration.
Spy vs. Spy: Using a dummy tied to the rails, the White Spy traps the Black Spy into being sliced by a train's wheels.
When Adults Say... Remind Them...: Comparisons between what adults tell teens today and the lives the adults lived as teens.
The MAD World of... Pets: Things that go wrong with pet-owning.
Monroe and... the Plane Trip: Monroe attempts to go on a school trip but his parents tag along as chaperones, so he makes sure they're all kicked off the plane.
MAD's All-Inclusive Do-It-Yourself Celebrity Scandal Blog Posting: Cut-and-paste blog, containing a variety of material to create ridiculous scandals about numerous celebrities.
Tell-Tale Signs That You've Got a Really Bad Psychic: Things bogus psychics might say.
